trans-unit.source: Represents the `<EncryptionProperty>` element used in XML encryption.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> class encapsulates the `<EncryptionProperty>` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> class to provide additional encryption information related to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
For example, use this class to specify a time stamp.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object.
The elemProp parameter is `null`.
The property of the elemProp parameter is not "EncryptionProperty".
-or-
The property of the elemProp parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.GetXml%2A> method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionProperty>` element.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
Gets the ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object from another location.
The ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object to match.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.LoadXml%2A> method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object to parse.
The value parameter is `null`.
The property of the value parameter is not "EncryptionProperty".
-or-
The property of the value parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.PropertyElement"></xref> property was set to `null`.

The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName"></xref> property of the value set to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.PropertyElement"></xref> property is not "EncryptionProperty".
-or-

The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI"></xref> property of the value set to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.PropertyElement"></xref> property is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Gets the target of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
The target of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
